summary:
## Lockheed F-117 Nighthawk

The F-117 Nighthawk was a secret American attack plane designed to avoid radar. It was the first plane built with "stealth" technology. Developed in the 1970s to counter Soviet missiles, it had a unique shape and special materials to reduce its radar signal.

The F-117 was used in several wars, including the Gulf War, where it hit many important targets. Despite its success, it was retired in 2008 because newer planes like the F-22 were available. Some F-117s are still kept flying today.
title: Lockheed F-117 Nighthawk
